column4: Hi, I was trying to upgrade my system from 10.04 to 12.04.  I manually changed the entries in sources.list and did aptitude update, now when I run aptitude dist-upgrade, lot of packages are being held back back because they depend on others, what do I do?
if you've made a backup, do a fresh install.
doing a fresh install is easy and saves you a ton of time trying to resolve issues.  just make a backup (obviously)  before attempting it.
